sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet' import Navbar from '../components/navbar' import Footer from '../components/footer' import './portfolioproject2.css' const Portfolioproject2 = (props) => { return (
exported project
Wētā  Realtime Unity Tools Integration





Unity Wētā Tools empower artists across characters, compositing, and environments, e nhance creativity, meet content demands, maintain quality, and accelerate workflows. Spend more time in the creative flow, and produce visually impressive content efficiently using top-notch industry tools.





My Responsibilities
During my time, I led the design of multiple Weta Realtime Tools integrations in the Unity Editor. My role involved ensuring a smooth transition of work brought over from Weta software to Unity, with no hiccups or confusion. Users are able to create immersive and stunning 3D world in the engine with the pro artistry tools we offer.



Competitor Auditing: {' '} Conducted in-depth competitor analysis to benchmark and define strategic design directions.

Alignment : Regular sync-ups with the product manager and developers to align on project goals and progress.

Solo Design Leadership : Managed all design aspects as the sole designer, ensuring coherence and quality.

User Experience Reengineering : Overhauled user workflows for improved integration within the product environment.

Cross-Platform Implementation : Collaborated with developers to implement and refine user flows across Windows, macOS, iOS, and Android, optimizing user engagement.

Projects
Hair Simulation Optimization
The Hair package in Unity is a comprehensive toolset for creating, importing, simulating, and rendering strand-based hair, suited for both lifelike digital humans and stylized content in games. Users can craft hair from the ground up or import assets from other digital content creation tools (DCC).



As the lead designer, I initiated a number of projects to refine the hair system workflow, significantly cutting down the time and effort needed to achieve the perfect hair look for various needs. View Case Study
Speedtree x {' '} Unity Integration
SpeedTree, the go-to vegetation toolkit in the industry, serves companies large and small for both realistic and stylized projects. Its integration with Unity is seamless, ensuring that imported assets maintain their data format for easy scalability and world-building.



I contributed to enhancing the SpeedTree-Unity workflow, enabling users to tweak SpeedTree models directly within a Unity scene. This allows for on-the-fly adjustments and variations of vegetation, with changes automatically saved and synchronized back to SpeedTree.

Progressive LOD (AutoLOD)
AutoLOD streamlines the process of importing geometric model assets by automatically generating simplified levels-of-detail (LOD), crucial for reducing manual LOD creation workload, scene complexity, and aiding in optimization.



I developed the workflow and UI for Unity’s AutoLOD, allowing users to generate a low-poly version of their asset with a single click upon import. Additionally, we integrated AutoLOD with Unity’s existing LOD system and various third-party plugins.

HDR Color Picker
Problem : The existing color picker struggles with HDR (High Dynamic Range) scenes or materials, showing glitches when toggling between RGB and HSV color channels.



Resolution : Collaboratively redesigned a versatile color picker for both general and HDR use, enabling adjustments in RGB/HSV modes, various unit systems, and featuring an exclusive intensity slider for HDR settings.



) } export default Portfolioproject2
